name: candy corn amigurumi
notes:
adorable little candy corn to brighten up your fall!  so, so fun to make!

easy to follow pattern with detailed instructions.

skill level: advanced beginner/intermediate

> please note that this pattern is
> available for free on my blog [here][1].
> the benefit of purchasing this pdf is
> an easy to read, printable, and
> ad-free version of the pattern.

materials needed:

* worsted weight yarn
* crochet hook size g (4.00 mm)
* 10 mm safety eyes
* fiberfill
* black embroidery floss
* tapestry needle and scissors

candy corn is approximately 2” wide by 2.5” tall

pattern will be available for instant download upon payment.

due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase.
